page.title: 19The Largest Factory
page.content: The largest company in our area is the Telecommunications Branch of the { {GENERAL ELECTRIC COMPANY p.l.c. Founded in 1886 it was the first manufacturer of telephone equipment in the U.K. for public service. Today it is Britains largest electrical Company ranking amongst the foremost in the world, with sales of nearly Â£5,500 million per year. The Headquarters are in Coventry and it employs about 13,000 people. The G.E.C. has producton facilites in Australia, Canada, New Zealand, and Nigeria. The G.E.C. has a well equipped Training School at its Headquarters where trainee engineers and technicians receive theoretical and practical instruction on the types of equipment for which they will later be responsible.
